name: A plain silver ring
data: It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than average.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
The ring reacts to the spoken word of the wearer.
